sentences.en: Arriving in Egypt, Frederick met the sultan, a fellow sceptic in religious questions.
sentences.cn: 抵达埃及后, 腓特烈拜见了宗教怀疑论者同伴苏丹.

sentences.en: As a safeguard Sultan ceded Rembau and Linggi to the Dutch.
sentences.cn: 苏丹把林茂和林吉割让给荷兰人,以作保证.

sentences.en: Chief of state and government is the hereditary sultan (Qaboos of Oman), who appoints a cabinet to assist him.
sentences.cn: 国家元首和政府是世袭的苏丹(阿曼? 卡布斯)，他任命内阁来协助他。

sentences.en: Command Performance for the King Sultan of Kalantan, Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚吉籣丹卅皇御前表演.

sentences.en: Everyone was entirely subject to the whim of the Sultan.
sentences.cn: 所有人都完全听命于苏丹王,由着他随心所欲.

sentences.en: For Christ's sake, Sultan, the kid's not even a professional.
sentences.cn: 看在耶稣的份上, 苏丹, 那个年轻人都不是个职业拳击手.

sentences.en: He defeated the Turkish Sultan , Bayazid the Thunderbolt, at Angora in 1402 , and took him prisoner.
sentences.cn: 1402年,他在安哥拉击败了土耳其苏丹, 并俘虏了他.

sentences.en: I'm sure that Rev. Sultan will give him a title shot at the appropriate time, right?
sentences.cn: 我相信牧师苏丹会在适当的时候给他争夺冠军的机会, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Send some love out to my dear and a special shout - out to the Reverend Sultan here.
sentences.cn: 把爱送给我亲爱的人还有特别的欢呼送给''牧师''苏丹.

sentences.en: She waited outside the sultan's office for one whole day.
sentences.cn: 她在苏丹王办公的地方外面等了一整天.

sentences.en: The sky was not bright for the Sultan today.
sentences.cn: 今天苏丹的天空有些昏暗.

sentences.en: The Sultan sings and a Jackal falls in the forest.
sentences.cn: 苏丹在歌唱,豺狗倒在了树林里.

sentences.en: The Sultan was still nominally the Chief of Staff.
sentences.cn: 苏丹仍是名义上的参谋长。

sentences.en: The sultan's wives and concubines live in the harem.
Wafa Sultan : These are personal matters that do not concern you.
sentences.cn: 这些都是私人事务,你管不着.

words.tran_cn: 苏丹（某些伊斯兰国家统治者的称号）

trans.tran_en: a ruler in some Islamic countries
